text: Robert Richers (by 1524 – 1587/89), of Lincoln's Inn, London and Wrotham, Kent, was an English politician. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Reigate in 1547, April 1554 and November 1554, and for Grampound in 1558. ==References== Category:1580s deaths Category:People from Kent Category:Members of Lincoln's Inn Category:Year of birth uncertain Category:English MPs 1547–1552 Category:English MPs 1554 Category:English MPs 1554–1555 Category:English MPs 1558 Category:16th-century births
title: Robert Richers
